properties.entry: select code, count(*) from anno_ontology_concept o inner join anno_base b on b.anno_base_id = o.anno_base_id inner join document d on d.document_id = b.document_id where d.analysis_batch in ('i2b2.2008') group by code
select cui1, cui2 from umls.MRREL where sab in ('SNOMEDCT') and rel in ('PAR')
